goals__remit:
To get Europe active outdoors ! 
We believe that outdoor activity is the best solution against inactivity and many more problems that come with living in our modern, European society (mental health problems, stress, disconnection from nature, violence lack of inclusion etc..). The IGOTCo exists to combat these problems and put a spotlight on outdoor activity as an efficient path towards a healthier, more productive, more inclusive and happier society.
